text: Bedini is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Gaetano Bedini, (1806–1864), Italian Catholic church dignitary *Silvio Bedini, (1917–2007), American historian *Renaldo Bedini, Albanian footballer *Ignazio Bedini, Italian catholic archbishop ==See also== *16672 Bedini *Bedini Bugyal, a Himalayan alpine meadow
title: Bedini
